original_text: And thou shalt come unto the priests the Levites, and unto the judge that shall be in those days, and enquire; and they shall shew thee the sentence of judgment:
korean_text: 레위 사람 제사장과 당시 재판장에게 나아가서 물으라 그리하면 그들이 어떻게 판결할지를 네게 가르치리니

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt come unto the priests the Levites
and unto the judge that shall be in those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 시대에 있을 재판관에게 나아가서

sentences.original_text: and they shall shew thee the sentence of judgment:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네게 재판의 판결을 보여줄 것이다:
